Sec. 8. He shall keep in his office a book, in
which shall be entered the name of every person
to be prosecuted for a violation of corporation ordinances; the nature of the complaint, and the
name and residence of the complainant in each
case.
Sec. 9. He shall keep a book, in which shall
be entered an exact copy of all official communications issued from his office.
ARTICLE III.
LIEUTENANTS.
Sec. 1. The Lieutenant in each district shall
have the general charge of the Police Station
Houses located there, and will be held responsible
for the cleanliness, general condition and good order of the Police Station Houses of their respective Districts.
Sec. 2. They shall require the members of their
command to be decently and cleanly attired.
Sec. 3.
